description: A representation of the capability of material that is committed, available, or unattainable for a specific time shall be presented as a material capability.
comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.02-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 2: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

contents.name: IsAssembledFrom
contents.description: The related object(s) makes up part of this material capability as the whole

contents.name: hasValuesOf
contents.description: The values in the material capability property are for this material capability.

contents.name: correspondsToClass
contents.description: A cross-model association to element in the material model as explained in Clause 3.3.8. Identifies the associated material class or set of material classes of the specification for a specific process segment

contents.name: correspondsToDefinition
contents.description: A cross-model association to element in the material model as explained in Clause 3.3.8. Identifies the associated material definition or set of material definition of the specification for a specific process segment

contents.name: correspondsToLot
contents.description: A cross-model association to element in the material model as explained in Clause 3.3.8. Identifies the associated material lot or set of material lot of the specification for a specific process segment

contents.name: correspondsToSublot
contents.description: A cross-model association to element in the material model as explained in Clause 3.3.8. Identifies the associated material sublot or set of material sublot of the specification for a specific process segment. Typically, either a material class or material definition is specified

contents.name: description
contents.description: Additional information about the process segment

contents.name: capabilityType
contents.description: Defines the type of capability.

enumValues.name: committed
enumValues.comment: : capacity that is committed for future productive use.

enumValues.name: unattainable
enumValues.comment: capacity that is not attainable for future productive use given the equipment condition, equipment utilization, personnel availability or material availability.

enumValues.name: available
enumValues.comment: capacity that is available for additional future productive use.

enumValues.name: used
enumValues.comment: a historical value that defines the portion of the capacity with acceptable quality.

enumValues.name: unused
enumValues.comment: a historical value that defines the portion of the capacity that was not used or had unacceptable quality.

enumValues.name: total
enumValues.comment: the sum of used and unused capability or the sum of available, unattainable and committed capability.

contents.name: reason
contents.description: Defines the reason for the capability type.

contents.name: confidenceFactor
contents.description: Measure of the confidence of the ability to obtain the capacity value.

contents.name: hierarchyScope
contents.description: Identifies where the exchanged information fits within the role based equipment hierarchy.

contents.name: hierarchyScopeRel
contents.description: Optional relationship to hierarchy.
contents.comment: Not part of the Standard Specs.

contents.name: spatialDefinition
contents.description: Spatially defines the equipment as a zero-dimensional point, one dimensional line, or two dimensional shape or three dimensional solid.

contents.name: storageLocationRel
contents.description: Optional relationship to storage location.
contents.comment: Not part of the Standard Specs.

contents.name: storageLocation
contents.description: Identifies the storage location of  the material resource(s) specified by this material segment specification

contents.name: storageLocationType
contents.description: Indicates whether the storage location attribute refers to an operational location, equipment or physical asset object, or contains a description of the storage location
contents.comment: Mandatory where a storage location is specified

enumValues.name: operationalLocation
enumValues.comment: storage location attribute references an operational location

enumValues.name: equipment
enumValues.comment: storage location attribute references an equipment object

enumValues.name: physicalAsset
enumValues.comment: storage location attribute references a physical asset

enumValues.name: description
enumValues.comment: storage location attribute contains a description of the storage location, such as a street address

contents.name: materialUse
contents.description: Defines the use of the material class, material definition, material lot, or material sublot in the context of the process segment.

contents.name: startTime
contents.description: The starting time associated with the material capability.

contents.name: endTime
contents.description: The ending time associated with the material capability.

contents.name: quantity
contents.description: Specifies the amount of material produced or used by the parent segment.

contents.name: quantityUnitOfMeasure
contents.description: The unit of measure of the associated quantity

contents.name: assemblyType
contents.description: Defines the type of the assembly

enumValues.name: physical
enumValues.description: the components of the assembly are physically connected or in the same area

enumValues.name: logical
enumValues.description: the components of the assembly are not necessarily physically connected or in the same area

contents.name: assemblyRelationship
contents.description: Defines the type of the relationships

enumValues.name: permanent
enumValues.description: an assembly that is not intended to be split during the production process

enumValues.name: transient
enumValues.description: a temporary assembly using during production, such as a pallet of different materials or a batch kit
